briefTitle: A Study of Pemetrexed, Carboplatin and Bevacizumab in Participants With Nonsquamous Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
officialTitle: Randomized, Open-Label, Phase 3 Study of Pemetrexed Plus Carboplatin and Bevacizumab Followed by Maintenance Pemetrexed and Bevacizumab Versus Paclitaxel Plus Carboplatin and Bevacizumab Followed by Maintenance Bevacizumab in Patients With Stage IIIB or IV Nonsquamous Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
summary: This study will compare overall survival in participants with Stage IIIB or IV nonsquamous non-small cell lung cancer.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline to date of death from any cause (up to 37.06 months)
